original_text: So his servant put her out and bolted the door after her. She was wearing an ornate robe, for this was the kind of garment the virgin daughters of the king wore.
korean_text: 암논의 하인이 그를 끌어내고 곧 문빗장을 지르니라 다말이 채색옷을 입었으니 출가하지 아니한 공주는 이런 옷으로 단장하는 법이라

sentences.original_text: So his servant put her out
and bolted the door after her.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 뒤로 문을 걸어 잠갔습니다.

for this was the kind of garment
